: For information on all Northwestern State University sports, see
: [[Northwestern State Demons]]

The 'Northwestern State Demons football' program is the intercollegiate American
football team for Northwestern State University located in the U.S. state of
Louisiana. The team competes in the NCAA Division I Football Championship
Subdivision (FCS) and are members of the Southland Conference. Northwestern
State's first football team was fielded in 1907. The team plays its home games
at the 15,971 seat Harry Turpin Stadium in Natchitoches, Louisiana.
